articles.author: ANSA.it
articles.title: Talebani vietano lo sport alle donne, 'espone i loro corpi' - Ultima Ora
articles.description:
I talebani hanno deciso che le donne afghane non potranno più giocare a cricket né a nessun altro
sport che "esponga i loro corpi" o le mostrino ai media. (ANSA)
articles.content:
(ANSA) - ROMA, 08 SET - I talebani hanno deciso che le donne
afghane non potranno più giocare a cricket né a nessun altro
sport che "esponga i loro corpi" o le mostrino ai media. Lo ha
detto in un… [+967 chars]

articles.title: Proteas confirmed for blockbuster tour to England in 2022 | Sport
articles.description: Cricket South Africa has confirmed a full tour for the Proteas men to England next year.
articles.content: Cricket South Africa (CSA) has confirmed a full tour for the Proteas men to England that will include three One-Day Internationals (ODIs), three T20 Internationals and three Test matches from 19 July… [+1267 chars]

articles.title: Test cricket match between Australia and Afghanistan likely to be cancelled after Taliban says it will ban women from playing
articles.description: A test match cricket game between Australia and Afghanistan in Hobart later this year is likely to be cancelled, after the Taliban confirmed it would ban women from playing any sport.
articles.content:
A test match cricket game between Australia and Afghanistan in Hobart later this year is likely to be cancelled, after the Taliban confirmed they would ban women from playing any sport.

articles.title: Ashes to 'hopefully' have full houses
